Name: Capture node stacktrace
Description: Can I capture node creation stack trace?
Author: @pankajparashar

Chrome.Notes:
1. Enable "Capture node creation stacks" in Settings (`F1`) > Experiments.
2. In the **Elements** panel > Select the node > Open the **Stack Trace** pane in the side panel to show the stack trace of the node creation.
Chrome.Name: Capture node stacktrace

Edge.Notes:
1. Enable "Capture node creation stacks" in Settings (`F1`) > Experiments.
2. In the **Elements** panel > Select the node > Open the **Stack** **Trace** pane in the side panel to show the stack trace of the node creation.
Edge.Name: Capture node stacktrace

Opera.Notes:
1. Enable "Capture node creation stacks" in Settings (`F1`) > Experiments.
2. In the **Elements** panel > Select the node > Open the **Stack** **Trace** pane in the side panel to show the stack trace of the node creation.
Opera.Name: Capture node stacktrace
